intro.title: What kind of trader are you?
paragraphs: Every trader approaches the market differently: some rely on logic, some trust their instincts, others chase momentum.
Take this quick 6-question quiz and discover your unique trading style — based on your risk tolerance, decision-making, and market behavior.
It only takes 1–2 minutes. Ready to find out who you are on the market?

universalResultIntro: You've completed the Trading Style Quiz!
Markets are complex... your reactions to risk and your preference for intuition or structured strategy shape your behavior.

Based on your answers, we've calculated your position on the chart using two axes: Risk Tolerance (vertical) and Intuition–Strategy (horizontal). Your point shows the balance — that's your trading personality.
